name: Cobb Salad-Inspired Brussels Sprouts With Lemon Vinaigrette
description: Brussels sprouts, bathed in lemony vinaigrette, are updated with Cobb salad-inspired accoutrements.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup, plus 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil, divided
2 pounds brussels sprouts, cored and thinly sliced into shreds
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
5 slices bacon or 3 ounces diced pancetta, browned

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil in a large sauté pan over high heat until shimmering. Add half of the brussels sprouts and cook, stirring, for 1 minute. Transfer to a large bowl. Add remaining half of raw brussels sprouts and season with salt and pepper.
Prepare the vinaigrette by whisking together remaining 1/2 cup of olive oil, red wine vinegar, lemon juice, and garlic. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Add blue cheese, tomato, and pancetta or bacon to brussels sprouts. Drizzle with vinaigrette, toss, and serve at room temperature.
